channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 蒙古遭遇冬季极端天气，200 万动物死亡
item.description:
2 million animals dead as extreme winter weather hits Mongoliahttps://t.co/xcJlwxck7k pic.twitter.com/YNaBY76TZA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）周一宣布采取新措施，帮助乌克兰抗击俄罗斯入侵，并表示甚至不排除西方国家派遣地面部队以实现欧洲击败莫斯科的目标。
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron announced Monday new steps to boost Ukraine in its fight against the Russian invasion, saying not even the sending of Western ground troops was ruled out to achieve Europe's goal of defeating Moscowhttps://t.co/qJ81I5K4YU pic.twitter.com/0EY6IaXCCO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 美国周一发布的一份报告显示，波音公司的员工对该航空巨头在2018年和2019年致命空难后实施的安全报告系统变更感到困惑和不信任 ⬇️
item.description:
Boeing employees are confused and distrustful of changes to safety reporting systems implemented by the aerospace giant after fatal plane crashes in 2018 and 2019, according to a US report released Monday ⬇️https://t.co/Hz4YD3PEOd

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING 澳大利亚警方正在调查泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）父亲涉嫌袭击的案件
item.description:
#BREAKING Australian police investigating Taylor Swift's dad for alleged assault pic.twitter.com/CSporuad3N

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 周一，美国最高法院在一起可能决定社交媒体未来的案件中，听取了关于限制内容审核的两项州法律是否符合宪法的辩论
item.description:
The US Supreme Court, in a case that could determine the future of social media, heard arguments on Monday about whether a pair of state laws that limit content moderation are constitutionalhttps://t.co/nKNJcVuNCc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）下月首次刑事审判的检察官周一要求法官对这位前总统下达禁言令，理由是他有诋毁证人的记录 ⬇️。
item.description:
The prosecutors in Donald Trump's first criminal trial next month asked Monday for the judge to impose a gag order on the former president, arguing that he had a record of disparaging witnesses ⬇️https://t.co/RBjt2FJGEX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 拜登在与塞斯-迈耶斯（Seth Meyers）一起在会客室买完薄荷片冰淇淋后，就加沙停火问题回答 @杰夫-梅森 1 ："我的国家安全顾问告诉我，我们快成功了，快成功了，但还没完成。我希望下周一我们就能实现停火。
item.description:
Biden, after buying mint chip ice cream at parlor with Seth Meyers, on Gaza ceasefire, answering @jeffmason1 : ‘My national security advisor tells me that we’re close, we’re close, we’re not done yet. My hope is by next Monday we’ll have a ceasefire.’ pic.twitter.com/uG1Alh2JRv

— Danny Kemp (@dannyctkemp) February 26, 2024

item.title: 祝贺 @AFPPhoto 记者 @JimWatson_AFP 、@b_smialowski、Andrew Caballero-Reynolds 和 @saulloeb 获得 @whnpa 颁发的 15 个 #EyesofHistory2024 奖项。
item.description:
Congratulations to @AFPPhoto journalists @JimWatson_AFP , @b_smialowski, Andrew Caballero-Reynolds and @saulloeb for winning 15 #EyesofHistory2024 awards from the @whnpa pic.twitter.com/VIFp0R6KMD

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 老鹰乐队（Eagles）主唱唐-亨利（Don Henley）周一表示，他是 "敲诈 "的受害者，因为三名男子被控试图出售从乐队 1976 年专辑《加州旅馆》（Hotel California）中窃取的约 100 页笔记 ⬇️。
item.description:
The Eagles frontman Don Henley said Monday he was the victim of "extortion" as the trial began of three men accused of trying to sell around 100 pages of stolen notes from the band's 1976 album "Hotel California" ⬇️https://t.co/aBqAplElgb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 来自美国国务院的消息："总统已抵达《30 Rock》，将在 NBC 的《Late Night with Seth Meyers》节目中惊喜亮相。今天是该节目播出 10 周年纪念日，时任副总统拜登曾在 2014 年 2 月的第一集中露面。
item.description:
From the WH: ‘The President has arrived at 30 Rock for a surprise appearance on NBC’s Late Night with Seth Meyers. Today marks the 10-year anniversary of the show, and then-Vice President Biden appeared on its first episode in February 2014.’

— Danny Kemp (@dannyctkemp) February 26, 2024

item.title: 一名希腊特使周一告诉@法新社记者@shauntandon，欧盟有望同意没收俄罗斯在欧盟内产生的利润，这是支持乌克兰的关键一步，但不会直接没收资产⬇️。
item.description:
The European Union is expected to agree to seize Russian profits generated in the bloc, a key step to backing Ukraine that stops short of calls to confiscate assets outright, a Greek envoy told @AFP's @shauntandon on Monday ⬇️https://t.co/OlFGoY8wbb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 智能手机制造商正在为其最新设备配备华而不实的新型人工智能工具，如实时语音翻译和高级照片编辑功能，以重新点燃消费者的需求 ⬇️
item.description:
Smartphone makers are packing their latest devices with flashy new artificial intelligence tools such as real-time voice translation and advanced photo editing in efforts to reignite consumer demand ⬇️ https://t.co/e8Vb0oSSsc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 在着陆过程中倾覆的美国月球着陆器从月球最南端发回了第一批图像 ⬇️
item.description:
An American lunar lander that tipped over during touchdown has sent back its first images from the farthest south any vessel has ever landed on the Moon ⬇️https://t.co/uDmMfeG2H5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 美国总统拜登（Joe Biden）和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将于本周四访问美墨边境，这将是他们在移民问题上争夺选民的一次高调冲突--移民问题是 2024 年大选中最热门的问题之一 ⬇️。
item.description:
President Joe Biden and Donald Trump will both visit the US-Mexico border on Thursday in a high-profile clash of schedules as they vie to win over voters on immigration -- one of the hottest issues in the 2024 election ⬇️https://t.co/jrGjfo0SfE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: .@美国总统乘坐海军陆战队一号抵达纽约华尔街着陆区
item.description:
.@POTUS arrives aboard Marine One at the Wall Street Landing Zone in NYC pic.twitter.com/JMQw2ACrA1

— Danny Kemp (@dannyctkemp) February 26, 2024

item.title: 周一，在以色列与巴勒斯坦激进组织哈马斯（Hamas）持续交战之际，巴勒斯坦儿童聚集在加沙地带北部的拜特拉希耶（Beit Lahia）领取援助食品。@法新社今日加沙战事报道全文 ➡️
item.description:
Palestinian children gather to collect aid food in Beit Lahia, in the northern Gaza Strip, on Monday amid continuing battles between Israel and the Palestinian militant group Hamas.@AFP's full story on the war in Gaza today ➡️ https://t.co/0v82vV9FOh pic.twitter.com/dLeOtBbYGm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 前世界排名第一的安迪-穆雷（Andy Murray）在周一赢得迪拜揭幕战后表示，他可能在未来 "几个月内 "退役 ⬇️。
item.description:
Former world number one Andy Murray suggested he may retire within the next "few months" after the tennis star won his opening match in Dubai on Monday ⬇️https://t.co/wGEd9pFKGW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）被发现操纵其房产价值以骗取有利的贷款条件，纽约法院对其处以 3.55 亿美元的罚款，特朗普对此提出上诉，法院文件周一显示 ⬇️。
item.description:
Former US president Donald Trump appealed the $355 million fine imposed by a New York court after he was found to have manipulated the values of his properties to fraudulently obtain favorable loan conditions, court filings showed Monday ⬇️https://t.co/3sXcHmIxdV

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 周一，数百名学生首次身着校服上学，这是一项全国性实验的一部分，目的是决定是否强制要求学生穿校服。
item.description:
A French town is testing what, for France, is a controversial idea: school uniforms.

Hundreds of pupils headed to school in uniforms for the first time on Monday as part of a national experiment to determine whether to make them compulsoryhttps://t.co/flSp7Qgr8C

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: #乌克兰只收到了欧盟承诺的一百万枚炮弹中的 30%：泽连斯基
item.description:
#BREAKING Ukraine has only received 30% of the million shells promised by EU: Zelensky pic.twitter.com/oJ1UQJDZse

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇹🇼 台湾鞭炮仪式标志着农历新年的结束在农历新年庆祝活动的最后一天，人们向台湾西北部的神像投掷鞭炮，以求带来财富和好运。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇹🇼 Taiwan firecracker ceremony marks end of Lunar New Year

People throw firecrackers at an effigy of a god in north-western Taiwan, in a ritual intended to bring wealth and good fortune on the final day of #LunarNewYear celebrations pic.twitter.com/5yahL78oav

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: #伊朗的浓缩铀库存是 2015 年协议限制的 27 倍：联合国核监察机构
item.description:
#BREAKING Iran's enriched uranium stockpile 27 times limit of 2015 deal: UN nuclear watchdog pic.twitter.com/k1UP4U2N8A

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇫🇷 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙周六在巴黎为一年一度的农业博览会揭幕，愤怒的农民们吹着口哨，大声辱骂马克龙，指责他的政府没有满足他们在价格、繁文缛节和国家援助方面的要求。📹 AFPTV#AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇫🇷 French President Emmanuel Macron opened the annual agricultural fair in Paris on Saturday as angry farmers blew whistles and shouted insults, blaming his government for not meeting their demands over prices, red tape and state aid.

📹 AFPTV#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/9RxheX9KCi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 安全消息人士称，以色列周一袭击了黎巴嫩巴勒贝克市附近的真主党目标，打死两名真主党成员，这是自加沙战争爆发后敌对行动开始以来对黎巴嫩东部地区发动的首次此类袭击 ⬇️
item.description:
Israel struck Hezbollah targets near the Lebanese city of Baalbek on Monday, killing two group members, security sources said, the first such attack on Lebanon's east since hostilities began after the Gaza war erupted ⬇️ https://t.co/1BuIMyhKk0

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: #亚美尼亚和阿塞拜疆外长将于周三在德国举行和平会谈：埃里温
item.description:
#BREAKING Armenia, Azerbaijan foreign ministers to hold peace talks in Germany from Wednesday: Yerevan pic.twitter.com/giATENfyyK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 英格兰顶级联赛周一宣布，埃弗顿俱乐部因违反财务规定而受到的处罚在上诉后已从 10 分降至 6 分 ⬇️ #AFPSports
item.description:
Premier League club Everton's penalty for breaching financial rules has been reduced from 10 points to six following an appeal, the English top flight announced on Monday ⬇️ https://t.co/ezt9CC2DKS #AFPSports

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: #在以色列驻华盛顿大使馆外自焚的美国空军成员死亡：五角大楼
item.description:
#BREAKING US Air Force member who set self on fire outside Israeli embassy in Washington dies: Pentagon pic.twitter.com/p853UCQOiW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇹🇼 台湾鞭炮仪式标志着农历新年的结束在农历新年庆祝活动的最后一天，人们向台湾西北部的神像投掷鞭炮，以求带来财富和好运。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇹🇼 Taiwan firecracker ceremony marks end of Lunar New Year

item.title: 视频：🇵🇸 加沙人利用纱布和白大褂制作尿布在加沙地带持续不断的战争中，一个拉法缝纫作坊变成了尿布工厂，帮助父母解决卫生用品短缺的问题📹📷 AFPTV#AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇵🇸 Gazans resort to gauze, labcoats to make diapers

A Rafah sewing workshop has turned into a diaper factory to help parents face the shortage of sanitary items amid the ongoing war in the Gaza Strip.

📹📷 AFPTV#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/ZIup6EKy0G

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇬🇧 克洛普：利物浦联赛杯冠军是 "最特别 "的奖杯对阵切尔西的胜利是由范迪克在加时赛结束前两分钟的头球破门锁定的，这场胜利发生在红军饱受伤病困扰的时期，这迫使克洛普派出了一支明显缺乏经验的球队 #AFPSports
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇬🇧 Klopp: Liverpool League Cup win 'most special' trophy

Victory against Chelsea, sealed by Virgil van Dijk's header two minutes from the end of extra-time, came during an injury-hit period for the Reds that forced Klopp to field a remarkably inexperienced team #AFPSports pic.twitter.com/4br9Ld1G9a

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 26, 2024
